meanings.definition: The quality or state of being lumpy.
meanings.sent1: The lumpiness of the mashed potatoes made them hard to swallow.
meanings.sent2: She noticed the lumpiness of the mattress when she sat down.
meanings.sent3: The lumpiness of the gravy made it look like a bumpy road.
meanings.sent4: The lumpiness of the dough resembled a mountain range.
meanings.sent5: The lumpiness of the carpet felt like walking on small hills.

meanings.sent2: The lumpiness of the sweater made it uncomfortable to wear.
meanings.sent3: The lumpiness of the pudding made it seem like a science experiment gone wrong.
meanings.sent4: The lumpiness of the ground made it difficult to walk smoothly.
meanings.sent5: The lumpiness of the paint created a unique and uneven finish.
